descriptionHtml:
Required!!

『RaceCompatibility.esm』

adds new MiniRace

?MiniNord
?MiniElf
?MiniOrc
?MiniKhajiit
?MiniAlgonian


=======installation

data folder overwrite or NMM use

new folder "00xMiniRace" automatic

Data/meshes/actors/character/00xMiniRace

not overwrite Skyrim vanilla Data

check "00xMiniRaces.esp"

ok

=======Option

all NPC MiniRace

1.
Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets

overwrite "00xMiniRace" skeleton.nif & skeletonbeast.nif

2.
Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets female

overwrite "00xMiniRace" skeleton_f.nif & skeletonbeast_f.nif

3.
rename?skeleton_f.nif & skeletonbeast_f.nif > skeleton_female.nif & skeletonbeast_female.nif

ok

=======recommend MOD

Enhanced 3rd Person Camera

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29990

=======

I cannot write English
author: MoSoLaboratory
